description:
Urere, the popular invader, shows up again, this time with a plan he doesn`t mind letting the Keroro Platoon take credit for!  But while his train tracks are crisscrossing Japan, there might just be an ulterior motive hidden behind them.  Later, Giroro gets turned into a liquid and helplessly tries to protect Natsumi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Urere, The Reverend King of the Trains / Giroro, Beauty and the Liquid Keronian
ウレレ 電車の王様 / ギロロ 美少女と液体ケロン人
